name: Total Knockback
description:
For this project, i worked as the Producer/Co-Designer on our little game , Total Knockback.
With our team, Thumbs Up, we spent 2 months creating this little game. The only level we have is a little bit small, a good tutorial level. 
We worked with two artists, two programmers, and two designers, to create this little Hack n' Slash high power game.

You can read more about it at http://nickbarnettdesign.weebly.com/portfolio.html

Be warned, it does require two Xbox controllers (360 or Xbox One) to play
